shop.description: Create your own webstore and monetize your gameserver with our advanced but easy to use shop system.
shop.bulletPoint1: Create your own products and rewards
shop.bulletPoint4: Conditional offers, discount codes and more

bansWarnings.description: Manage your community and enforce your server rules with our sophisticated ban and warning system.
bansWarnings.bulletPoint1: Ban and warn players in-game or through the webpanel

andMore.description: VyHub is full of small and big additional features that build up to a great user experience.

simple.bulletPoint1: Say goodbye to all kinds of now unnecessary plugins
simple.bulletPoint2: Direct contact with the developers for enhancements

customizable.bulletPoint1: Fully adjustable and customizable for your needs
customizable.bulletPoint2: Customize background picture and color scheme
customizable.bulletPoint3: Upload html to create your own subpages

_faq.question1: What makes VyHub special compared to our competitors?
_faq.answer1: VyHub is more than a simple webstore. It is an all-in-one community management offering important features like bans and warnings.
_faq.answer2: Installing and using VyHub is free of charge. We only charge a small commission of 5% for all sales that occur through the webstore.
_faq.question3: Do you offer a free trial?
_faq.answer3: Yes! Since we do not charge a monthly price, you are able to use and test VyHub completely for free
_faq.question4: Can I use my own domain?
_faq.answer4: Yes, you can use your existing domain by creating a CNAME record that points to your VyHub instance.
_faq.question5: I am a GExtension user. Can I migrate my data to VyHub?
_faq.answer5: Yes, you can easily import your data.
_faq.answer6: Please first read our documentation for technical questions. You can contact us by using the contact form below.

_home.pageSubtitle: The all-in-one management & monetization platform {br}for your gaming community

_instance.setCNAMEDescription: Create a CNAME DNS record for your custom domain with this target. This points your custom domain to this VyHub instance.
_instance.statusHelp: Contact support if status does not change after 10 minutes.
_instance.statusHelpProvision: If this status does not change within 5 minutes, the CNAME record to your custom domain is probably not set correctly. Check the documentation or contact support if you need help.
_instance.statusHelpProvisioned: Your instance is ready to use now. If the site does not load, try to clear your DNS cache or restart your router. If this does not solve the problem, contact the support.
_instance.autoUpdateDescription: Instance is automatically updated at given UTC hour

Type the name of the instance to confirm.

_shop.title: Shop
_shop.subtitle: Sell ranks and ingame-items for real money.

_features.text1: Packets are the foundation of each webstore. Create your own packets which you can sell on the website for real money. You can organise packets in different categories to provide your users a better experience. Packets can be single purchase or recurring payments.
_features.text3: Whenever a player buys a packet, different rewards can be executed. Rewards can be everything from ingame currency to item drops. You can execute any ingame command with the rewards. Furthermore, you can also give players ranks!
_features.text4:: Monitor your sales with the integrated statistics. For example sales can be displayed by month or by country.
_features.text5: You can provide your players with discounts. These discounts can apply for the whole store or only certain packets. This way you can award players for good performance.
_features.text6: VyHub supports multiple payment methods. You can accept PayPal, Paysafecard and Stripe payments. With Stripe a lot of local payment methods are covered. Furthermore users can use the built-in credit system for payments. There is also an option to accept custom coupon codes for a purchase which then need to be approved manually by an admin.

_features.text1: You can easily change the theme of the website! This includes colors, a dark mode or a different background image.
_features.text4: You can create custom pages with all html/javascript possibilities. You can show these sites in the navigation bar.

_community.title: Community
_community.subtitle: Save time and effort managing your community.

_features.text1: You can ban players from your gameservers with VyHub. Bans can be created for a set of gameservers or globally across all your servers. Users have the ability to create a ban-protest which then can be looked at by the admins.
_features.text2: You can warn users, which are then automatically banned after a warning threshold is achieved.
_features.text3: Your players can talk with each other using VyHub's forum. With the rights management it is even possible to create member only topics.
_features.text4: For better managing your community and streamlining the support process VyHub offers you a ticket system. Players can create tickets which are then being resolved by team members..
_features.text5: Groups can be part of the team. A team page is created automatically, which allows players to connect to the right person.
_features.text6: Adverts are small messages which can be announced periodically on the gameservers.

_dashboard.title: Dashboard
_dashboard.subtitle: All player information in one view.

_features.text1: You can see all the important information at a glance via the user dashboard. This includes all the connected accounts the user has. Furthermore, stats are displayed on the dashboard. By default playtime is recorded, but more stats are possible to show!
_features.text2: Have a look at all online players with the server dashboard. This dashboard allows you to access all important player and game related features out of one place.

_features.text1: Groups are the basis of the permission system implemented in VyHub. Every player can be part of one or many groups. The groups can have different permissions. Groups can be also awarded following a purchase.
_features.text3: All functionality on the website is guarded by permissions. Every group you create can have different permissions. This makes it possible to create a hierarchy of groups. This can be fully adjusted to fit your needs for example to create groups for team members.

_furtherFeatures.title: Further Features
_furtherFeatures.subtitle: There is a lot more to discover.

_features.text2: To better personalize VyHub and interact with your community, VyHub is translated in multiple languages. Currently three languages are fully supported, more languages are currently translated! Community owners like you, can help translating VyHub.
_features.text3: VyHub comes with a full featured REST API. You can use this API to do everything (and more) you can also do with the frontend. Own plugins integrating the API are possible as well.
_features.text4: VyHub comes with a complimentary vyhub.app sub-domain. If your prefer using your own domain, this is possible! The use of your own domain comes with no additional cost.

_partners.title: Partners
_partners.headline: Ready to promote the best game server management system?
_partners.description1: Your friends and followers will thank you when they try VyHub for the first time.{br} You'll also earn a 25% recurring commission.
_partners.description2: Your Vyhub.net account already includes an affiliate link ready for sharing.

_games.gmodDescription: VyHub supports Garry's Mod, the famous physics sandbox.
_games.minecraftDescription: VyHub supports Minecraft, the most-played survival sandbox game. Currently this plugins requires Java >= 17 and Minecraft >= 1.13.
_games.discordDescription: VyHub supports Discord, the free voice, video and text chat app.

_features.gmodIngameDashboard: Ingame Dashboard for bans and warnings
_features.gmodPlayerSync: Synchronize player groups (support for ULX, xAdmin, SAM, FAdmin, ServerGuard and more)
_features.rewards: Infinite possibilities with rewards (Custom Commands/Scripts, Ingame Money, Item drops...)
